C

ConfigManager - Class in <Unnamed>
This class contains the configurations of our web-crawler Its a singleton class .
ConfigParser - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides methods which parse the configurations file content and will store them in key value pairs in a HashMap and provide that HashMap to the crawler environment

configs - Variable in class ConfigManager

This method will convert a string to its corresponding data-type e.g.
CrawlEngine - Class in <Unnamed>
This class contains the main method which is the starting point of the program.

D

DataCenter - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides data structures to be used as a central data storage for links repositories.

F

fetch(String) - Method in class PageFetcher
This method will fetch the html text of a webpage whose URL is passed to it as argument

G

This method will return ConfigManager's singleton object

H

hasCapacityReached() - Method in class DataCenter
This method checks if the visited-link-pool is out of capacity or not
hasMoreUnvisitedLinks() - Method in class DataCenter
This method checks if there are any link still to visit in the unvisited-link-pool

isAllowedLinkType(Link) - Method in class LinkValidator
This method will check whether a particular type of link is allowed or not LinkType means whether its a link to a css , or js or html or a jpeg etc.
isLinkVeryDeep(Link) - Method in class LinkValidator
This method will check whether the link to be visited is very deep or not
isVisitable(Link) - Method in class LinkValidator
This method determines should we visit the given link or not

L

Link - Class in <Unnamed>
An Object of a class Link represent one url link in memory

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CrawlEngine
This is the main method of our application, which starts the crawler engine This will instantiate all the resources needed for the crawler engine to run.
markVisited(Link) - Method in class DataCenter
This will add the link to the visited-link-pool, so that we don't visit it again

P

PageFetcher - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides methods for fetching a web-page's html text from server

PageParser - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides method to parse the HTML data to extract out all the links from that data
PageParser() - Constructor for class PageParser
 
parse(String) - Static method in class ConfigParser
This method parses a configuration file and load the configurations into system the contents of the configuration file should be key value pairs separated by equals sign "=".
parse(String) - Static method in class PageParser
This method parses the htmlContent and extracts all the links present in the html page
politenessDelay() - Method in class CrawlEngine
if we continuously keep on requesting the server , then it will increase the load on server which can result into either of the two problems i.
putLink(Link) - Method in class DataCenter
This method will store a link to the unvisited-link-pool.
putSeed(String[]) - Method in class CrawlEngine
This method will put some initial links to the unvisited link pool in dataCenter these links will act as seed for the crawler

R
